Title: Investigating the Scene
Text: Upon receiving a report of a bag theft, I need to investigate the crime scene thoroughly. Ms. Beatrice Johnson provided me with a description of the assailant and the direction they fled. It's crucial to search the area for any evidence or potential leads that could help track down the thief.
CompleteText:
I've thoroughly searched the crime scene and gathered valuable evidence. It's time to use this information to track down the thief and recover the stolen bag.
I need to go West of Garmos Street, then follow Minchally Street, a small street parallel to Gramos Street that leads to the east of Minchally Block.
